name: Toy Store (Anaconda Games)
description:
You incarnates a piggy bank locked in a toy store. Try everything you can to stay full, it seems like the  other toys want to empty you out! It might be a good idea to keep an eye on what you got left inside you!

Controls: 

  • WASD or ZQSD or Arrows to move around
  • Mouse Left or Mouse Right to attack
